001
002import java.util.List;
003
004
005/**
006 * convert playlist
007 *
008 * @author matecsaba
009 */
010public class pls2cue {
011
012    /**
013     * the main
014     *
015     * @param args arguments
016     */
017    public static void main(String[] args) {
018        if (args.length != 2) {
019            playerUtil.put("usage: pls2cue <source.pls> <target.cue>");
020            return;
021        }
022        playerUtil.put("reading " + args[0]);
023        playerLyric txt = playerUtil.readup(args[0]);
024        playerUtil.put("converting " + txt.size() + " lines");
025        List<playerSong> pls = playerSong.txt2pls(null, txt);
026        playerUtil.put("sorting " + pls.size() + " songs");
027        playerSong.sort(pls);
028        playerUtil.put("converting " + pls.size() + " songs");
029        txt = playerSong.cue2txt(pls);
030        playerUtil.put("writing " + txt.size() + " lines to " + args[1]);
031        playerUtil.saveas(txt, args[1]);
032    }
033
034
035}
